title: Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol Unveil Bronze Statue in London’s Leicester Square to Mark ‘DDLJ’ 30th Anniversary (EXCLUSIVE)
summary: Shah Rukh Khan and Kajol traveled to London to unveil a bronze statue commemorating their iconic roles in “Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge,” marking 30 years since the Yash Raj Films blockbuster first captured audiences worldwide. The statue, depicting the film’s central characters Raj and Simran in a …
